page.title: 18WELLKNOWN PEOPLE in RHAYADER
page.content: The oldest inhabitant of Rhayader is Mrs.Emily Elizabeth Gertrude Lloyd who was born in 1884. One of the oldest families is the Holland family,who live at Dderw House a mile outside Cwmdeuddwr on the old drovers'road to Aberystwyth.This house has been in Lady Holland's family since the 16th century.Lady holland's daughter,Claerwen,studied art at the Byam Shaw School in Campden Street, London from 1961-64 where she won the Principal's Prize at a students' exibition (a picture of Dderw kitchen garden,hung in 1985 Summer Exibition at the Royal Academy).She passed the National Diploma of Design in Fine Arts and also won a David Murray Landscape Studentship given by the Royal Academy.Since then she has exibited many times in England and Wales in one-man and mixed shows.
